name: The Holy Berries
description:
Working on this for the Game Jam

The idea is your a travelling cat, because you travel the wise cat has you go on a quest to bring different holy berries for him to make the medication for the prince.

Just trying to figure out the code for treasure rooms. Have a the bar-bones made.

This is my 2nd text-base game I made, still learning, this is what I have so far.
